Uses of Class
api_p.StackEvent

Packages that use StackEvent
Package
Description
api_b
Provides the classes necessary to create a business logic that can process commands from a Saga managed by Exagon.
api_p
Provides the classes necessary to create an Exagon protocol mapper that bridges the Exagon stack and the business logic.

  • Uses of StackEvent in api_b

    Methods in api_b that return StackEvent
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    StackEvent
    IExagonCommandReply.getStackEvent()
    Extracts the network reply returned by a ExagonCommandHandler method.

  • Uses of StackEvent in api_p

    Methods in api_p that return StackEvent
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    StackEvent
    IExagonProtocolMapper.convertInternalReply(Object internalReply)
    Converts a internalReply into an external reply.
    StackEvent
    IExagonProtocolMapper.convertInternalRequest(Object internalRequest)
    Converts a internalRequest into an external request.
    StackEvent
    IExagonProtocolMapper.createInternalErrorReply()
    Returns static external error reply when an internal error occurs in the middle of a Saga.
    StackEvent
    IExagonProtocolMapper.createRollbackReply()
    Returns static external error reply when a rollback occurs in the middle of a Saga.
    StackEvent
    IExagonProtocolMapper.createTimeoutReply()
    Returns static external error reply when a timeout occurs in the middle of a Saga.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Object
    IExagonProtocolMapper.convertExternalReply(StackEvent externalReply)
    Converts a externalReply into an internal reply.
    List<Object>
    IExagonProtocolMapper.convertExternalRequest(StackEvent externalRequest)
    Converts an externalRequest into a list of internal requests.
